caption: The duality of Judas—halo half gold, half black—captured in a moment where mercy and despair collide.
image_prompt: A dramatic Renaissance-style painting depicting Christ kneeling in Gethsemane, His face etched with divine sorrow. An angel descends from a luminous sky, offering a golden chalice, while three apostles sleep nearby, their postures heavy with exhaustion. In the foreground, Judas stands with a conflicted expression, his halo split—half radiant gold, half shadowed black—symbolizing the tension between betrayal and redemption. The background is a moonlit garden with twisted olive trees, their branches echoing the anguish of the scene. The composition balances divine light and human frailty, emphasizing the moment before Judas' fateful choice.
